title: Potassium-based nanomaterials significantly enhance nutrient utilization efficiency and promote high crop yields
content:
Environ. Sci.: Nano, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EN00148F, Paper
Qibin Wang, Ying Liao, Weichen Zhao, Tianjing Yi, Yaqi Jiang, Guikai Zhu, Yi Sun, Quanlong Wang, Lili Huang, Fangwu Chen, Peng Zhang, Yukui Rui
Using potassium-based nanomaterials to save potassium resources and studying their effects and mechanisms on soybean growth.
